# LinearPCM

**Enumeration Case**

The linear Pulse-Code Modulation (PCM) format.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCM
```

## Discussion

This format uses the standard flags.

## Pulse Code Modulation Formats

- **AppleIMA4**: The Apple implementation of IMA 4:1 Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.
- **DVIIntelIMA**: The DVI/Intel IMA Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.
